alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Colquitt and southern Worth Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Baconton, or 9 miles northeast of Camilla, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Norman Park, Doerun, Riverside, Schley, Funston, Bridgeboro, Minton, Pineboro, Scooterville, Anderson City, Ticknor, Minnesota, Powelltown, Spence Airport, South Moultrie, Sigsbee, Pritchetts, Poplar Arbor Church and Crosland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
